sentences.content: The most recent ICES advice (ICES 2019a) concerning white skate described the stock development
over time as follows: “This species has disappeared from most areas of former habitat in the
Northeast Atlantic. There are very few recent, authenticated records of white skate in this area;
these isolated records are from the English Channel, western Irish waters, and Portuguese waters.
